#      BUILD_SHARED_LIBS
#      – Switch between shared and static libraries

  include/gucefMT_ETypes.h
  include/gucefMT_macros.h
  include/gucefMT_mutex.h
)

set(SOURCE_FILES 
  src/gucefMT.cpp
  src/gucefMT_CActiveObject.cpp
  src/gucefMT_CCondition.cpp
  src/gucefMT_CCriticalSection.cpp
  src/gucefMT_CGUCEFMTModule.cpp
  src/gucefMT_CICloneable.cpp
  src/gucefMT_CMutex.cpp
  src/gucefMT_CReadWriteLock.cpp
  src/gucefMT_CScopeMutex.cpp

  src/gucefMT_CTMailBox.cpp
  src/gucefMT_dvmtoswrap.c
  src/gucefMT_DVRWLOCK.c
  src/gucefMT_MUTEX.c
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( gucefMT ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} )

# Add system specific libraries
if (WIN32)
  set( PLATFORM_LIBS Winmm.lib )
  target_link_libraries( gucefMT ${PLATFORM_LIBS} )
endif()

set_target_properties( gucefMT PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS GUCEFMT_BUILD_MODULE )

GUCEF_config_lib( gucefMT )



#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



include_directories( include )
